
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/p/18967209" title="发布于 2025-07-05 14:26">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">精选 10 个 C#/.NET 开发必备开源库！</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>DotNetExercises介绍</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><strong>DotNetGuide</strong></span></a></span>专栏C#/.NET/.NET Core编程技巧练习集：C#/.NET/.NET Core编程常用语法、算法、技巧、中间件、类库、工作业务实操练习集，配套详细的文章教程讲解，助你快速掌握C#/.NET/.NET Core中各种编程常用语法、算法、技巧、中间件、类库、工作业务实操等等。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>GitHub开源地址：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetExercises" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetExercises</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>想要学习C#/.NET/.NET Core什么技术欢迎Issues中留言：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/issues/42" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/issues/42</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>DotNetGuide技术社区：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/6H2-x-Von_s-04-c2CtSHg" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/6H2-x-Von_s-04-c2CtSHg</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250705142321025-394079694.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>xUnit</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>xUnit 是一个开源、免费、以社区为中心的 .NET 单元测试框架，是用于 C# 和 F#（其他 .NET 语言可能也能运行，但未提供官方支持）进行单元测试的最新技术。xUnit 能够与 Visual Studio、Visual Studio Code、ReSharper、CodeRush 和 TestDriven.NET 兼容。它是.NET 基金会的一部分，并遵循其行为准则。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247514754&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=c9a6ee07e6f1d36c2b28b977886cbabe&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/_jZNx2V1mRJCVL4m0nFzxw</span></a></span></span></li>
<li>开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/xunit/xunit" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/xunit/xunit</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250705142339478-584523678.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Moq</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Moq是一个.NET开源、流行、使用简单的 .NET 模拟库，充分利用了.NET 的 Linq 表达式树和 lambda 表达式。这使得 Moq 成为最具生产力、类型安全且支持重构的模拟库。它不仅支持模拟接口，还支持模拟类。其 API 非常简单直观，不需要任何关于模拟概念的事先知识或经验。从而简化单元测试中的依赖管理和验证过程，提高代码的可测试性和可维护性。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247506599&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=930eaaaa4f5c84cc31397c24639e832b&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/lJMf3UP1TQHAdE1gi9DWQw</span></a></span></span></li>
<li>开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/devlooped/moq" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/devlooped/moq</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>BenchmarkDotNet</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>BenchmarkDotNet是一个基于.NET开源、功能全面、易于使用的性能基准测试框架，它为.NET开发者提供了强大的性能评估和优化能力。通过自动化测试、多平台支持、高级统计分析和自定义配置等特性，BenchmarkDotNet帮助开发者更好地理解和优化软件系统的性能表现。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247507728&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=e74b6a3d66776cd3e63a806a0cbf4d6b&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/6mpHS1OVuIlBgdU71OIIOw</span></a></span></span></li>
<li>开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/dotnet/BenchmarkDotNet" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/dotnet/BenchmarkDotNet</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>QuestPDF</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>QuestPDF 是一个用于生成 PDF 文档的现代开源 .NET 库。QuestPDF 由简洁易用的 C# Fluent API 提供全面的布局引擎。轻松生成 PDF 报告、发票、导出等。QuestPDF它提供了一个布局引擎，在设计时考虑了完整的分页支持。与其他库不同，它不依赖于 HTML 到 PDF 的转换，这在许多情况下是不可靠的。相反，它实现了自己的布局引擎，该引擎经过优化，可以满足所有与分页相关的要求。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247495837&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=94418ee2b681bfff6de59fece9446f0f&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/ZLxDsDE-UQnYdLnVw4h3Kg</span></a></span></span></li>
<li>开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/QuestPDF/QuestPDF" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/QuestPDF/QuestPDF</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250705142417674-1038117355.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>BouncyCastle</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>BouncyCastle是一款C#版开源、免费的Bouncy Castle密码库，开发人员可以通过该项目在他们的 C# 应用程序中使用 Bouncy Castle 提供的各种密码学功能，从而加强数据的安全性和保护隐私信息。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247497558&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=406755efc08b09636f973e0f3aebbe78&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/_VLzuDkyELusgsjFO6Wkog</span></a></span></span></li>
<li>开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/bcgit/bc-csharp" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/bcgit/bc-csharp</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>ScottPlot</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>ScottPlot是一个免费、开源（采用MIT许可证）的强大.NET交互式绘图库，能够轻松地实现大型数据集的交互式显示。使用几行代码即可快速创建折线图、柱状图、饼图、散点图等不同类型的图表。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247497564&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=af337ba43a3ce55979a40aa45cb0302a&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/d-nUV3pLQ5_MhyfV4rEzAg</span></a></span></span></li>
<li>开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/ScottPlot/ScottPlot" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/ScottPlot/ScottPlot</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250705142452326-1649506543.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>AutoMapper</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>AutoMapper是一个简单易用的.NET对象映射库，用于快速、方便地进行对象之间的转换和映射，极大的简化了开发人员在处理对象映射时的工作量。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247500520&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=0a6cc6e78f1658e1d38f67ce91e57390&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/i4Wn0ox22gIffB8UwoBZXQ</span></a></span></span></li>
<li>开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/LuckyPennySoftware/AutoMapper" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/LuckyPennySoftware/AutoMapper</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>CsvHelper</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>CsvHelper是一个.NET开源、快速、灵活、高度可配置、易于使用的用于读取和写入CSV文件的类库。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247502097&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=a8b64662ad0bdda4127a302547566d96&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/md9kqIyVOKkvQv8xD7LCWA</span></a></span></span></li>
<li>开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/JoshClose/CsvHelper" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/JoshClose/CsvHelper</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Terminal.Gui</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Terminal.Gui是一个跨平台（Windows、Mac 和 Linux/Unix ）、开源（遵循 MIT License）、免费的用于为.NET、.NET Core 和 Mono 构建丰富功能的控制台应用程序的工具包，并且该工具包适用于需要强交互性的场景。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247502654&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=590edbf07dab40343932017ecaac63a8&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/c9eonfbaHksv5vIc3tH0Ig</span></a></span></span></li>
<li>开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/gui-cs/Terminal.Gui" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/gui-cs/Terminal.Gui</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250705142523325-1189217191.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>QrCodeGenerator</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>QrCodeGenerator 是一款 .NET 开源（MIT License）、免费、简单易用、功能强大的二维码生成类库。</span></p>
<ul>
<li><span>详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247503576&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=a879d201e8eb7f96b019de10902ae8aa&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/9XoyCoKM79lUhilckPle2Q</span></a></span></span></li>
<li>开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/manuelbl/QrCodeGenerator" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/manuelbl/QrCodeGenerator</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250705142535505-724665750.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<div id="gtx-trans" style="position: absolute; left: 102px; top: 4760.75px">&nbsp;</div>
</div>
